data.eml:eml: A new species of Chondrostoma Agassiz, 1832 (Cypriniformes: Cyprinidae) with sexual dimorphism from the lower Rio Tejo Basin, Portugal.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hugo F. Gante, Carlos D. Santos, Maria Judite Alves (2007): A new species of Chondrostoma Agassiz, 1832 (Cypriniformes: Cyprinidae) with sexual dimorphism from the lower Rio Tejo Basin, Portugal. Zootaxa 1616: 23-35, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:AF430D3B-4F81-4CAF-9EBD-F3AA5D16FDF0
